text: Visvasigala palige devadutaru svatah tam'ma jivakkinta heccu priyaragiruttare mattu avara (dutara) patniyaru, avara palige mateyaragiruttare. Innu, allahana granthada prakara, itara visvasigalu mattu valasigariginta rakta sambandhigalu, paraspara heccu hakkudararagiruttare. Nivu nim'ma apta mitrarige maduva upakaravu idakke horatagide. Idu granthadalli barediruva niyama
